query:
-- Buscar todos os testes psicométricos concluídos
SELECT 
  pt.id,
  pt.testType,
  pt.employeeId,
  e.name as employeeName,
  pt.status,
  pt.completedAt,
  pt.createdAt,
  pt.results
FROM psychometricTests pt
LEFT JOIN employees e ON pt.employeeId = e.id
WHERE pt.status = 'completed'
ORDER BY pt.completedAt DESC
LIMIT 50;
